output.SQL:
SELECT 
    ROWID as painting_id,
    title,
    inception,
    genre,
    CASE 
        WHEN title LIKE '%War%' OR title LIKE '%war%' THEN title 
        ELSE NULL 
    END as war_in_title,
    CASE 
        WHEN genre LIKE '%War%' OR genre LIKE '%war%' THEN genre 
        ELSE NULL 
    END as war_in_genre
FROM paintings
WHERE 
    title LIKE '%War%' 
    OR title LIKE '%war%'
    OR genre LIKE '%War%'
    OR genre LIKE '%war%'
ORDER BY inception;
